channel.title: git on 潜水员的咖啡小屋
channel.description: Recent content in git on 潜水员的咖啡小屋

item.title: Git 查看文件指定范围的修改记录
item.author: gilfoyle.k@outlook.com (潜水员)
item.description: 查看一个文件指定范围内的所有修改记录 1 git log -p -2 -L1081,+5:'hello/world.go' -p -2 或者 --patch -2 往前展示两个 commit 的 diff . 在 git 中 commit 和 patch 是同一个意思参考下文. git commands patching A few commands in Git are centered around the concept of thinking of commits in terms of the changes they introduce, as though the commit series is a series of patches. -L 语法 -L<start>,<end>:<file>, -L:<funcname>:<file> 限制指定查看范围.
item.content:encoded:
查看一个文件指定范围内的所有修改记录

1

git log -p -2 -L1081,+5:'hello/world.go'

-p -2 或者 --patch -2

往前展示两个 commit 的 diff . 在 git 中 commit 和 patch 是同一个意思参考下文.

git commands patching

A few commands in Git are centered around the concept of thinking of commits in terms of the changes they introduce, as though the commit series is a series of patches.

-L 语法 -L<start>,<end>:<file>, -L:<funcname>:<file>

限制指定查看范围.
